amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike all of subtitle C of title II except section 237 (Iron Dome program).
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 22 printed in Part B of House Report 113-108 to strike all of subtitle C of title II except section 237 (Iron Dome program).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Holt amendment (A017) Failed by recorded vote: 61 - 362 (Roll no. 230).
